message:
This is fantastic. Although as you say, is using reflexion. Is not a big deal is this case. But another solution like this but without reflection:
you can have an interface with the properties you want to configure and implement this interface for each environment.
Then, if you have dependency injection, you can inject the interface with the implementation, depending you environment. And thatâ€™s it, you can access to the parameters of you environment wherever you need.
To end with, if the repository is public, you should add this files to .gitignore.
Both solutions are totally fine, but the more you avoid reflection on xamarin projects, the better.
